== Video Overview ==

Ubuntu Mobile Edition sprouts a new interface specifically designed for mobile devices. This video will give an overview of that new interface, as well as outlining UME's primary features.

== Target Audience ==

* John is comparing different mobile devices, one of which has Ubuntu Mobile Edition installed on it. John wants to be informed about UME's features so he can make an educated decision on which mobile device to buy.

* Sally wants to make sure she likes UME's interface before she buys her device. The screencast reassures Sally that the UI meets her needs.

== Objectives ==

After watching this video, you will be able to:

* Make an informed decision whether UME is right for you.
